"Teams":
"Once one of your classes is level 10 or higher, you can create a team.

Having a team lets you chat with other team members
to keep in touch, even when they're located in another block or room.

You can also join a team before you reach level 10 by receiving
an invitation from another player."

"All characters using the same Player ID and on the same ship will belong
to the same team.

Team members are all assigned a rank. Team member ranks are displayed
in the team member list."

"TEAM RANKS
Team Leader: Can use all team functions.

Manager: Can use basic team functions and invite others.

Member: Can use basic team functions.

Prospect: Prospective new members that have not yet been approved by the Team Leader.
Can use basic team functions."

"Expanding your team:

It is possible to expand teams.
Expanding a team provides benefits, such as a special
Team Room and a Team storage that is shared by all members."

"Expanding a team provides benefits such as a special team room and a team storage
that is shared by all members."

"To expand a team, you will require team points. Team points are earned by completing requests.

You may accept requests and also receive request rewards via Team Counter Clerks
accessible on both Team Room and ARKS Gate Area."

"New expansion options are unlocked as your team gains levels. Work together to build
a strong, unique team!"

チームを拡張すると専用のルームを所持したり
チーム用の倉庫をメンバーで共有できたりします。"
